short_description: carisolo grinding is an appliance repair & maintenance services company based in sauk city, wisconsin, united states.
long_description: our family engages in cutlery business in wisconsin, minnesota, iowa, illinois, buffalo, new york city, kansas city, and the bay area california. at carisolo grinding we provide and sharpen knives for professionals through the cutlery rental program / knife service. drawing on the skills passed down for 4 generations in our family, we provide the highest quality finish available. sharpening of machine blades is offered. for generations, providing sharp knives to professionals and home chefs has been our trade and our passion. our commitment to quality and service defines our work.
business_tags: knife sharpeners | grinding services | blade services | delivery area
generated_description: carisolo grinding service, legally known as carisolo inc., is a family-owned business based in sauk city, wisconsin. the company specializes in professional knife sharpening and cutlery services, catering to both commercial food service operations and individual customers. with a history spanning five generations, the maestri family, descendants of italian knife grinders, continues to uphold the tradition of providing high-quality knife sharpening services. their offerings include hand edging, water-cooled grindstone techniques, buffing, and precision honing, ensuring durable and razor-sharp edges. the company serves the regions of madison and milwaukee, wisconsin, and extends its services across multiple states including wisconsin, minnesota, iowa, illinois, new york city, kansas city, and the bay area of california.
